Question
========

From a normally distributed population, a sample of size 25 is drawn. The mean of the sample is 13 and the standard deviation 4.2. The variance of the sample mean is equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 0.168
* 0.7056
* 0.84
* 3.528

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.168: Incorrect
* 0.7056: Correct
* 0.84: Incorrect
* 3.528: Incorrect
